about_the_game:
Overview:


"Wanderer's Shade: Path of the Void" is an unforgettable journey through mysterious realms in a 2D adventure game rendered in striking pixel art. You play as the Wanderer, a mysterious figure who awakens in the Void, a place outside of time and reality, with no memories of their identity or how they arrived. As you progress through diverse "worlds," each filled with challenges and secrets, you collect items that gradually unveil the forgotten story of the protagonist.

Explore beautifully designed environments in shades of black and white that evoke both nostalgia and a fresh visual experience. Each world offers unique puzzles and revelations that shape the game's compelling narrative, as you uncover the truth about the Wanderer and the mystery of the Void.

Key Features:


  • Minimalist Pixel Art Graphics: Enjoy a distinctive and atmospheric visual style that captures the essence of classic adventure games while presenting a novel approach.
  • Deep and Engaging Narrative: Discover a rich story that unfolds through intriguing dialogues and interactions with the surrounding environment.
  • Exploration and Mystery: Travel through various worlds, each with its own challenges and secrets to unravel, from the World of Innocence to the World of Loss.
  • Intuitive and Accessible Gameplay: Simple controls and engaging game mechanics ensure that players of all skill levels can enjoy the adventure.
  • Multiple Endings: Your choices and discoveries influence the fate of the Wanderer, leading to different story conclusions.
"Wanderer's Shade: Path of the Void" is not just a game; it's an experience that stays with you. Prepare to explore, solve, and uncover a world where every step matters and every memory holds meaning.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card compatible with DirectX 10
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not applicable
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i3 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 11 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not applicable
